testCase.name: microfrontend bootstraps the app
microfrontend mounts and unmounts
IndexComponent should render the component without crashing
IndexComponent should display the correct title and breadcrumbs based on the investmentType parameter
IndexComponent should render the correct form step based on the step state
handleDraft should set isConfirmOpen to false when called
handleDraft should call modifyProduct with updated form data and isDraft set to true when process is modify
handleDraft should call createInvestment with form data and isDraft set to true when process is create or clone
handleLinks should return the input "links" array unmodified when "process" is not "restructure"
handleLinks should update the title of the object with id=2 to "Restructure Investment" when "process" is "restructure"
handleLinks should return the input "links" array unmodified when "links" array does not contain an object with id=2 and "process" is "restructure"
handleLinks should update the title of the first object with id=2 to "Restructure Investment" when "process" is "restructure" and there are multiple objects with id=2
handleNav should navigate to summary page when current step is equal to total number of steps
handleNav should throw an error when setStep parameter is not a function
updateInvestmentTabs should return an array of objects with updated amount and totalValue properties
updateInvestmentTabs should update amount property with the total value of investments for each tab
updateInvestmentTabs should update totalValue property with the total count of investments for each tab
updateInvestmentTabs should return an empty array when the input tabs array is empty
updateInvestmentTabs should return an array of objects with amount property set to 0.00 and totalValue property set to 0 total investments when the input tabs array is empty
updateInvestmentTabs should return an array of objects with the same length as the input tabs array
Overview should render Overview component without crashing
Overview should display investment tabs with correct titles and icons
Overview should display investment amounts and total values correctly formatted
Dashboard should render Investment Management dashboard with Overview tab selected by default
Dashboard should render Investment Management dashboard with Book Investment button
Dashboard should allow user to switch between Overview, Corporate and Individual tabs
Summary should render the component without crashing
code snippet should render the Investment Management page with the correct title and breadcrumbs
code snippet should display the Investment PRODUCTS section with the Individual Investments and Corporate Investments subsections
Test App Component If App is rendered wihout issues
